FindingName: MSOnline (MSOL) PowerShell Module Enabled on Tenant
Description: Microsoft's legacy Entra ID PowerShell Module MSOnline (MSOL) PowerShell is not disabled on the tenant. This module does not support Modern Authentication and is deprecated as of March 30, 2024 with no updates or support beyond migrating existing scripts and workloads to Microsoft Graph.
Remediation: Remediation of this finding may be completed by running the below PowerShell command.

References.Text: Important: Entra ID Graph Retirement and Powershell Module Deprecation
